TopicTitle: How to build a shuttle with a cargo-hold?

Articles.Content:
I am building a shuttle and after watched a few videos, I realise there is some parts I don't actually have them.

for example, the open-able cargo door.

are they come from Mod some where else? or I can build them up by those elementary parts?

help pls Orz
B9, Touhou Torpedo's mk3 expansion pack, Firespitter, and a few other mod packs all have cargo bays.
B9 has good cargo bays in lots of options.

I am building a shuttle and after watched a few videos, I realise there is some parts I don't actually have them.

for example, the open-able cargo door.

are they come from Mod some where else? or I can build them up by those elementary parts?

help pls Orz

If you prefer vanillar KSP like I do, then the only way to attach cargo to your main launcher is to use coupling.
